title: welcome
message: Good ${greeting}, ${firstName} and welcome to ${company}! Room #${roomNumber} is now ready for you!

title: fine
message: Good ${greeting} , ${firstName}. We wish to inform you that we will be keeping your deposit. You can find out more at ${companyWeb}.com.

title: want room service?
message: Good ${greeting}, ${firstName} ${company} Would like to welcome you with food. enjoy your stay in Room #${roomNumber}!
